alert.note: Alert for Cole; Osage (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 3:54PM CDT until April 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Cole County in central Missouri... Osage County in central Missouri... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Hickory Hill, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Linn, Belle, Freeburg, Westphalia, St. Thomas, Rich Fountain, Meta, Argyle, Koeltztown, and Osage Bend. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
